edu.cmu.tetrad.search

Class Mbfs

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.tetrad.search.Mbfs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphSearch, MbSearch

    public final class Mbfs
extends Object
implements MbSearch, GraphSearch
    Searches for a pattern representing all of the Markov blankets for a given target T consistent with the given independence information. This pattern may be used to generate the actual list of DAG's that might be Markov blankets. Note that this code has been converted to be consistent with the CPC algorithm.
    Author:
    Joseph Ramsey
